file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3

info:
  title: Crawler API
  description: |
    Crawler API enables to extract product information from cycling sites.
    Crawls products and brands. 

  version: 1.0.0
  x-logo:
    url: "https://velocorner.com/assets/images/logo50.png"
    backgroundColor: "#FFFFFF"
    altText: "Velocorner"

servers:
  - url: http://localhost:9010/v1
    description: Local

paths:
  /info:
    get:
      tags:
        - info
      summary: Retrieve generic information
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'info.yaml'                
        '429':
          description: Request limit
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  error:
                    $ref: 'error.yaml'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse path items: path "/info": get: responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: at 1:399: external "info.yaml": get: file: local file reference is not allowed
